Description: Completing this degree enriched my understanding in diverse fields including rock and mineral identification, structural geology, volcanology, sedimentology, aerial map interpretation, and Geographic Information Systems (GIS). Despite the hurdles, the journey expanded my horizons and deepened my passion for exploration and analysis within the realm of geosciences.

This degree has provided me with a solid foundation in software development. As a graduate, my primary focus was on mastering C++, PHP, JavaScript, SQL databases, CSS3, and HTML5. Additionally, I gained valuable insights into software life cycles, methodologies, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), data structures, computer networks, and web-oriented programming

Participating in this program enhanced my understanding of troubleshooting and Agile Software methodologies, enabling me to proficiently design a variety of desktop and web applications. I acquired knowledge and skills in C#, web programming, ASP.NET, ASP.NET MVC, and database connectivity.
